title: General Atlantic Collects $7.8 Billion for Latest Commingled Fund
sub_head: The firm now has about $23.8 billion of capital for new growth-oriented investments across its four main capital pools
body:
General Atlantic has wrapped up its latest commingled growth fund with $7.8 billion, surpassing the fundâ€™s target of $5 billion.
The latest fund is more than double the size of its predecessor, which wrapped up with $3.3 billion, according to Graves Tompkins, managing director and global head of capital partnering for the firm.
